# programAccountTypeQuery

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function programAccountTypeQuery(
  sdk: RequiredParam<ThirdwebSDK>,
  address: RequiredParam<string>,
): {
  queryKey: readonly [
    "__tw__",
    "sol",
    RequiredParam<import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk/solana").Network>,
    "program",
    RequiredParam<string>,
    "type",
  ];
  queryFn: () => Promise<"nft-collection" | "nft-drop" | "token">;
  enabled: boolean;
  cacheTime: number;
  staleTime: number;
};
```
